title: Shock
description:
Trevor Noah, TS Madison and Christopher Fox share stories of shocking moments in the lives, funny and frightening.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, Doorly and Dajae, Trevor Noah, Christopher Fox, Echo and the Bunnymen, Jaymes Young, Jeff Barr, TS Madison)
